doc:
Jacques Charby https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jacques_Charby 0 Jacques Charby (13 June 1929 – 1 January 2006) was a French actor, director, writer, and outspoken activist during against colonialism during the Algerian War. A member of the Réseau Jeanson or Jeanson network, he cooperated with Algeria's National Liberation Front in the fight for Algerian independence. He also wrote the first feature-length film chronicling Algerian Independence, entitled So Young a Peace, which was entered into the 4th Moscow International Film Festival. Jacques_Charby ( 13_June_1929 – 1_January_2006 ) was a_French_actor , director , writer , and outspoken_activist during against colonialism during the_Algerian_War . A_member of the_Réseau_Jeanson_or_Jeanson_network , he cooperated with Algeria 's_National_Liberation_Front in the_fight for Algerian_independence . He also wrote the_first_feature-length_film chronicling Algerian_Independence , entitled So Young a_Peace , which was_entered into the_4th_Moscow_International_Film_Festival .
